summary_promot:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Metadata:
            - Document Title: Elder Armourworm Spirit
            - Section Title: How to Get the Elder Armourworm Spirit
            - Sub-Section Title: Elder Armourworm Spirit

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "# Elder Armourworm Spirit



The Elder Armourworm relies mostly on its large, fat body during the fight. Expect to dodge lots of belly flops and huge swipes with the upper portion of its body. Thankfully, the Elder Armourworm is quite slow, so you should be able to dodge most attacks without too much trouble.

## How to Get the Elder Armourworm Spirit

Once unlocked, Zodiac Village is where you can find all of the 'shop' NCPs, like the Xu Dog, Shen Monkey, and a new blacksmith character named Yin Tiger. Chen Loong will also reside there.

Speak to Chen Loong and hand over an item called the Proto Armourworm. The Proto Armourworm will turn up in a small basket just above the seed baskets outside Chen Loong's hut. You need to feed the Proto Armourworm three Rice Cocoons to make it grow into a Spirit that you can absorb the next time you visit the village.

You can get Rice Cocoons from egg sacks throughout the Webbed Hollow!

### Elder Armourworm Spirit"
            - Following Text: "* **Foul Spray**
* Equipped Effect: Slightly increases Critical Hit Chance when in Poisoned state.

The Elder Armourworm's Spirit allows you to take the form of the great worm and flail about the arena, spraying poison everywhere. These poisonous pools deal Poison Bane to any enemies who make contact with them. They don't do any damage to you, though, so you don't have to worry about watching your step after the move is complete. If you do become poisoned for any other reason, however, the Elder Armourworm's equipped effect increases your Critical Hit Chance until the effect has worn off."

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
            3. Incorporate any relevant metadata (e.g., section or document titles) to improve coherence, **but do not assume any domain-specific knowledge** unless explicitly stated.
            4. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.



            Output Format:
            Preceding Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the preceding text that gives context to the image.
            Image Summary:
            Provide a summary of the image, describing its purpose and content based on the context.
            Following Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the following text that elaborates on the information related to the image.
img_summary:
Preceding Text Summary:  
The preceding text explains how to obtain the Elder Armourworm Spirit in the game. Players must visit Zodiac Village, interact with Chen Loong, and feed a Proto Armourworm three Rice Cocoons, which can be collected from egg sacks in the Webbed Hollow. Once the Proto Armourworm grows, players can absorb its Spirit.

Image Summary:  
The image displays the in-game menu under the "Equipment" tab, specifically highlighting the Elder Armourworm Spirit. It provides details about its abilities, such as "Foul Spray," which allows the player to spray venom that creates poisonous pools on the ground, inflicting Poison Bane on enemies. The Spirit's equipped effect increases Critical Hit Chance when the player is poisoned. The interface also includes stats, Spirit options, and a demo preview.

Following Text Summary:  
The following text elaborates on the Elder Armourworm Spirit's abilities. It allows players to transform into the Elder Armourworm, flail around, and spray poison that creates pools harmful to enemies. The Spirit's equipped effect boosts Critical Hit Chance when the player is poisoned, enhancing their combat effectiveness.
